title: Minecraft Dungeons 1.1.2.0 版本更新日志
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-9 23:17 编辑 

Minecraft Dungeons 1.1.2.0 版本更新日志
发布时间 - 2020.6.9

该版本仅限Xbox One与Nintendo Switch平台。

Xbox One:
Improved stability改善稳定性Fixed an issue that caused the Corrupted Cauldron not to spawn in the Soggy Swamp mission during online multiplayer修复了在线多人游戏时腐化锅釜巨怪无法在潮湿沼泽关卡中生成的问题Fixed an infinite loading screen when accepting a game invite while the title was suspended during online gameplay修复了在线游戏中，在暂停界面接受游戏邀请时卡在加载的问题Fixed a crash that could occur when joining local multiplayer修复了本地多人游戏加入玩家时可能发生的崩溃

Nintendo Switch:
Improved data collection to help identify game crashes改进了数据的收集，有助于识别游戏崩溃问题The game now has the correct naming across all languages游戏在所有的语言中现在都会正确的显示名字

https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360044268272
